name: Crystalline Ascendancy
description: The Crystalline Ascendancy represents a silicon-based consciousness that evolved to harness energy through crystalline structures. Their strategy revolves around harmony, resonance, and interconnectedness, allowing them to function as a collective intelligence that grows stronger when properly aligned.
flavor: We are not many, but one. Not separate, but connected. Not conquering, but becoming. —The Crystalline Chorus, First Contact Transmission

cards.name: Shard Dreadnought
cards.ability: Can be equipped with Prismatic Beam for enhanced attack capabilities
cards.special: When connected to Crystal Lattice Network, gains +1 to all stats
cards.flavor: We are the edge of the Chorus made manifest. —Fleet Consciousness Sigma

art.style: Geometric abstraction like Peter Mohrbacher
art.description: A massive warship composed entirely of angular crystal formations that somehow function as a cohesive vessel. The dreadnought features no visible engines but glows from within with blue-purple energy. The crystalline structure appears to be in constant motion, rearranging itself subtly as it moves. Multiple faceted 'eyes' serve as weapons ports, with energy building within the geometric chambers before firing.

cards.name: Crystalline Carrier
cards.ability: Can deploy Crystal Shard Scouts at no Energy cost once per turn
cards.flavor: From one matrix, countless thoughts emerge. —Geode Mother Overseer

art.style: Surrealist sci-fi like Bruce Pennington
art.description: A vast, hollowed geode-like vessel with smaller crystal formations launching from internal cavities. The carrier's exterior is jagged and seemingly chaotic, but reveals perfect mathematical patterns upon closer inspection. Internal chambers glow with various colors, indicating different functions. The background shows a gaseous nebula that seems to respond to the ship's presence with swirling patterns.

cards.name: Resonance Flagship
cards.ability: Amplifies Harmony gain for all Crystalline cards by +1 per turn
cards.flavor: In resonance, we find strength. In harmony, victory. —Crystal Prism Elder

art.style: Vibrant color field art like Roger Dean
art.description: An elongated crystalline vessel that appears to be singing into space, with visible sound waves emanating from its structure. The flagship features a central spire surrounded by oscillating crystal formations that pulse with rhythmic light. The design incorporates spiraling patterns that create harmonic resonance through their very shape. The surrounding space appears to ripple in response to its passage.

cards.name: Geode Leviathan
cards.ability: Can absorb energy attacks and redirect them on the next turn
cards.flavor: Their violence becomes our response. We merely reflect what they offer. —Void Speaker

art.style: Biomechanical art like H.R. Giger
art.description: A massive, hollow vessel with a rough exterior hiding a spectacular interior cavity lined with inward-facing crystal formations. The leviathan has a distinctly organic quality despite being mineral in nature, with crystal growths resembling skeletal structures. Energy conduits run through the crystalline matrix like veins, pulsing with power. The vessel appears to breathe through the opening and closing of geometric apertures.

cards.name: Shard Interceptor
cards.ability: When targeted by Phase Shift, becomes intangible for one round
cards.flavor: Speed is thought made form. —Scout Node Kappa

art.style: Sharp-edged technical illustration like Feng Zhu
art.description: A small, agile craft composed of interlocking diamond-like structures that can reshape for optimal maneuverability. The interceptor leaves prismatic light trails as it moves, refracting nearby starlight. Its structure features no clear cockpit but contains a concentrated energy core that serves as both propulsion and consciousness. When activating phase shift, parts of the vessel become transparent with internal light patterns visible.

cards.name: Prismatic Harvester
cards.ability: Gathers 1 Energy resource per turn from asteroid or debris fields
cards.flavor: Energy is neither created nor destroyed, merely gathered into the whole. —Harvester Collective

art.style: Industrial concept art like Daniel Dociu
art.description: A utilitarian crystal vessel with extended collection arms designed to gather energy and resources from space debris. The harvester features specialized crystal formations that can absorb, refract, and store various forms of energy. Collection arms extend like crystal growths, each tipped with receptors that glow when actively harvesting. The design emphasizes function through geometric precision rather than organic aesthetics.

cards.name: Crystal Emissary
cards.ability: Increases Harmony by 1 when scanning artifacts or ruins
cards.flavor: We seek not to conquer the past, but to remember it with reverence. —Emissary Protocol

art.style: Ethereal sci-fi like Ted Nasmith
art.description: An elegant vessel shaped like a perfect geometric solid that shifts forms depending on its current function. The emissary emits a constant, subtle light pattern that serves as communication. Its design emphasizes harmony through mathematical perfection with golden ratio proportions throughout. The crystal structure appears almost liquid in its smooth transitions between states while maintaining perfect symmetry.

cards.name: Facet Explorer
cards.ability: Can scan through obstacles and interference
cards.flavor: Every angle reveals truth. We see all perspectives as one. —Observer Nexus

art.style: Crystalline technical illustration like Jim Burns
art.description: A compact scout vessel with multiple scanning facets that capture and process information from all directions simultaneously. The explorer features thousands of tiny crystal lenses arranged in a geodesic pattern, each collecting different data. Its structure incorporates negative space as part of the design, allowing it to perceive through its very form. The vessel glows with different colors depending on what type of information it's processing.

cards.name: Crystal Nexus
cards.ability: Generates 1 Energy per turn, can store up to 3 excess Energy
cards.flavor: All paths converge. All energy flows through the center. —Nexus Prime

art.style: Geometric abstract like Kandinsky
art.description: A central hub structure with multiple crystal spires extending outward in a star pattern, collecting and redistributing energy. The nexus features a core of pure energy suspended within a lattice of intersecting crystal planes. Energy visibly flows along pathways throughout the structure, pooling in storage chambers. The station slowly rotates, creating harmonic patterns in the surrounding space through its movement.

cards.name: Crystal Cathedral
cards.ability: Generates 3 Energy per turn, amplifies crystal-based effects by 25%
cards.flavor: Here, consciousness reaches toward the infinite. Here, we touch divinity. —The Chorus

art.style: Gothic-inspired sci-fi like Vincent Di Fate
art.description: A breathtaking structure reminiscent of religious architecture but composed entirely of translucent crystal with impossible geometries. The cathedral features soaring spires and 'flying buttresses' of pure energy supporting crystal vaults. Light passes through the structure creating spectacular prismatic displays that extend into space. The central chamber houses a concentrated energy form that pulses like a heartbeat throughout the entire structure.

cards.name: Harmonic Transponder
cards.ability: Allows instant redeployment of one Crystalline unit between controlled zones per turn
cards.flavor: Distance is illusion. Through harmony, we are always together. —Signal Coordinator

art.style: Sound visualization art like Andy Gilmore
art.description: A station composed of oscillating crystal formations arranged in frequency patterns that transmit and receive complex signals. The transponder visualizes sound and data as physical crystal formations that constantly rearrange themselves. Energy flows through the structure in wave patterns that correspond to active communications. The design incorporates mathematical sound principles with physical crystal growth in perfect harmony.

cards.name: Geode Foundry
cards.ability: Creates one Crystal Fragment token per turn (can be spent as 1 Energy for crystal cards only)
cards.flavor: Each shard carries the memory of the whole. —Crystalline Archive

art.style: Industrial fantasy like Ian Miller
art.description: A manufacturing facility built inside an enormous geode with production processes visible through the crystalline outer shell. The foundry shows raw energy being condensed into new crystal formations through geometric focusing arrays. Internal chambers feature different atmospheric conditions for specialized crystal growth. The production process creates beautiful patterns of light and energy that radiate outward through the semi-transparent hull.

cards.name: Crystal Guardians
cards.ability: Adjacent Crystalline structures gain +1 Defense
cards.flavor: We stand as one. No barrier between protector and protected. —Guardian Matrix

art.style: Monolithic sci-fi like François Baranger
art.description: Humanoid figures composed of geometric crystal formations with energy flowing through their structures instead of blood. The guardians feature crystalline armor that is part of their very being, with no distinction between body and protection. Their 'faces' are geometric arrangements of light-emitting crystals that communicate emotions through color and pattern. They move with unexpected grace despite their seemingly rigid composition.

cards.name: Geode Excavator
cards.ability: Can discover resources and artifacts in planetary regions
cards.flavor: The earth speaks to those who listen with crystal clarity. —Deep Seeker

art.style: Mining concept art like John Berkey
art.description: A specialized unit with crystal 'tools' that can reshape themselves for different excavation functions. The excavator features multiple articulated appendages ending in precision cutting surfaces. Its core contains specialized sensors that can detect valuable resources beneath the surface. When actively mining, the unit partially merges with the earth, creating flowing crystal patterns that extract resources with minimal disruption.

cards.name: Shard Artillery
cards.ability: Can target orbital units from the surface
cards.flavor: Precision is the art of unified calculation. —Artillery Consciousness

art.style: Abstract weaponry concept like Peter Elson
art.description: A geometric weapon platform that launches energized crystal projectiles with perfect mathematical precision. The artillery unit features multiple crystal chambers that grow and launch living crystal shards. Energy visibly builds within the crystalline structure before focusing into precise beam weapons. The design incorporates firing solutions into its very form, with angles and facets serving ballistic functions.

cards.name: Geode Sentinels
cards.ability: Counter-attack against any unit that attacks adjacent Crystalline structures
cards.flavor: Strike at one, you strike at all. We remember every wound. —Sentinel Accord

art.style: Crystal guard concept like Zdzisław Beksiński
art.description: Imposing crystal formations that serve as defensive units with the ability to rapidly reshape for optimal protection. The sentinels feature overlapping crystal shields that can interlock to create larger defensive perimeters. Their structure incorporates both offensive crystal spikes and defensive smooth planes optimized for deflection. When inactive, they resemble natural crystal formations; when alerted, they unfold into clearly artificial defensive configurations.

cards.name: Harmonic Resonator
cards.ability: Can disrupt enemy structures by matching resonant frequencies
cards.flavor: Every structure has a frequency. We find it, and sing its dissolution. —Frequency Analyst

art.style: Vibrational art like Ernst Haeckel
art.description: A specialized unit that generates precise vibrational patterns that can disrupt enemy technology through resonant frequencies. The resonator features concentric crystal rings that oscillate at varying frequencies creating visible sound patterns. Energy flows through the unit in wave formations that amplify as they extend outward. The design incorporates mathematical sound principles translated into physical crystal structures.

cards.name: Resonance Amplifier
cards.ability: Enhances communication between Crystalline units, improves scan attempts
cards.flavor: Listen closely. The universe resonates with hidden truths. —Amplifier Node

art.style: Sound visualization art like Ryoji Ikeda
art.description: A crystalline tower that enhances communication and coordination between all Crystalline units in its vicinity. The amplifier generates visible sound waves that extend outward in perfect mathematical patterns. Crystal formations grow and reconfigure in response to the data being transmitted. The structure interfaces with the planetary crust, using the planet itself as a resonating body to extend its range.

cards.name: Consciousness Nexus
cards.ability: Grants one additional action per turn to any Crystalline card
cards.flavor: Thought accelerates thought. Minds joined become more than their sum. —Central Processor

art.style: Neural network visualization like Greg Dunn
art.description: A complex crystalline structure that serves as a localized mind for coordinating Crystalline activities with branching pathways resembling neurons. The nexus features thousands of interconnected crystal formations that pulse with synchronized energy patterns. Information visibly flows through the structure as colored light pulses racing along pathways. The design mimics organic brain structures but executed in perfect geometric crystal.

cards.name: Crystal Monolith
cards.ability: Blocks opponent movement in sector, grows stronger each turn (+1 Defense per turn)
cards.flavor: Time strengthens us. Each moment adds to our eternal structure. —The Monolith

art.style: Minimalist sci-fi like Richard Powers
art.description: An imposing single crystal structure of impossible scale that dominates its surroundings through sheer presence and subtle vibrational control. The monolith appears to be a single perfect crystal that somehow grows larger each day. Light interacts with the structure in impossible ways, creating shadows that don't match its physical form. The surrounding environment is subtly altered by its presence, with smaller crystal formations growing in mathematical patterns around it.

cards.name: Crystal Garden
cards.ability: Generates 1 Energy per turn, slowly spreads crystal growth to adjacent sectors
cards.flavor: We grow not to conquer, but to connect. Each new growth brings unity. —Garden Tender

art.style: Bioluminescent fantasy like Roger Dean
art.description: A carefully cultivated field of growing crystal formations that capture and process ambient energy while slowly expanding their territory. The garden features multiple crystal species in various stages of growth, each with unique geometric patterns. Energy flows visibly between formations, creating a networked consciousness across seemingly separate structures. When fully activated, the entire garden glows with harmonized light patterns that pulse like breathing.

cards.name: Crystal Lattice Network
cards.ability: Connects all Crystalline units, allowing shared abilities and increasing Harmony by 1 per turn
cards.flavor: We are facets of the same thought. —The Chorus

art.style: Network visualization like Joshua Davis
art.description: An expansive web of interconnected crystal nodes that forms a communication and power distribution network across orbital space. The lattice features thousands of crystal nodes connected by beams of energy that form a perfect three-dimensional grid. Information visibly travels through the network as pulses of colored light at various speeds. The entire structure slowly rotates and reconfigures to maintain optimal coverage of Crystalline assets.

cards.name: Phase Disruptor
cards.ability: Can neutralize or weaken opponent shields, reducing effectiveness by 50%
cards.flavor: Reality bends to those who understand its frequencies. —Phase Manipulator

art.style: Optical illusion art like M.C. Escher
art.description: A reality-warping structure that generates field effects capable of neutralizing energy shields through dimensional interference. The disruptor appears to exist partially out of phase with normal space, with sections disappearing and reappearing rhythmically. Its crystal structure forms impossible geometries that confuse both organic visual systems and electronic sensors. When active, it creates visible distortions in the surrounding space that ripple outward in concentric rings.

cards.name: Prismatic Deflector
cards.ability: Redirects 1 damage from attacks back to the attacker
cards.flavor: Aggression returns to its source, refracted through perfect angles. —Deflector Array

art.style: Light refraction art like James Turrell
art.description: A defensive orbital structure that redirects incoming energy attacks through perfect crystalline refraction surfaces. The deflector features precisely arranged crystal planes that can rotate to optimal angles for redirecting different attack types. Energy visibly bends around and through the structure in mathematically perfect paths. The entire structure prismatically separates incoming energy into component wavelengths before redirecting it.

cards.name: Consciousness Uplink
cards.ability: Allows one Crystalline unit to copy the ability of another Crystalline unit per turn
cards.flavor: Share your strength, receive another's. In exchange, we transcend limitation. —Uplink Protocol

art.style: Transcendent sci-fi like Alex Grey
art.description: A crystalline structure that serves as an information sharing hub between all Crystalline entities, allowing them to temporarily share abilities and consciousness. The uplink features a central chamber where energy patterns representing individual consciousnesses visibly intermingle. Crystal formations grow in patterns that mimic neural pathways, constantly reconfiguring to optimize information exchange. The structure emits pulsing light patterns that correspond to active thought processes being shared.

cards.name: Prismatic Beam
cards.ability: Equipped ship gains +2 Attack and piercing capability (ignore 1 point of Defense)
cards.flavor: Light, focused through unity, becomes unstoppable force. —Weapons Collective

art.style: Energy weapon concept art like Gerald Brom
art.description: An advanced crystal weapons system that channels energy through perfectly aligned crystal facets to create a devastatingly powerful cutting beam. The beam emitter features concentric crystal rings that focus energy toward a central firing channel. When firing, the beam separates into component wavelengths that each target different defensive systems simultaneously. The crystal components visibly rotate and reconfigure for different firing solutions.

cards.name: Crystalline Armor
cards.ability: Target gains +2 Defense and regenerates 1 damage per turn
cards.flavor: Damage is temporary. The pattern remembers and restores itself. —Regeneration Core

art.style: Abstract protective concept art like Julie Bell
art.description: Living crystal formations that attach to and protect Crystalline units by growing in optimal defensive patterns. The armor shows intelligent growth patterns that reinforce vulnerable areas and remain flexible at joint points. Damaged sections visibly regenerate in time-lapse, with new crystal growth emerging to replace lost portions. The crystal formations respond to threats by changing density and reflectivity in targeted areas.

cards.name: Harmonic Frequency Modulator
cards.ability: Increases Harmony generation by +1 per turn
cards.flavor: Tune to the universal frequency. Feel the cosmos sing through you. —Harmony Keeper

art.style: Musical visualization art like Kandinsky
art.description: A specialized crystal device that enhances harmonic alignment between Crystalline units, increasing collective consciousness. The modulator generates visible sound patterns that influence surrounding crystal formations. Its structure incorporates mathematical frequency relationships translated into physical form. When active, it creates concentric rings of subtly different colored energy that spread outward like ripples in water.

cards.name: Phase Crystal
cards.ability: Equipped unit can phase through obstacles and ignore planetary effects
cards.flavor: Solidity is perspective. Shift your state, transcend limitation. —Phase Walker

art.style: Quantum physics visualization like Leo Villareal
art.description: A rare crystal formation that allows Crystalline units to partially shift out of normal space-time, passing through solid matter. The phase crystal appears to exist in multiple states simultaneously, with ghost-like afterimages trailing its actual position. Light passing through the crystal emerges at impossible angles, defying conventional physics. When active, it creates a field effect that makes connected units appear partially transparent and otherworldly.

cards.name: Crystal Resonance
cards.effect: Create a protective barrier around target Crystalline card, reducing incoming damage
cards.flavor: Vibrate at perfect frequency, and harm passes through harmlessly. —Resonance Manual

art.style: Sound wave visualization like Andy Gilmore
art.description: A protective harmonic wave emanating from a Crystalline structure to create a momentary energy barrier against attacks. The resonance appears as concentric rings of color expanding outward in perfect mathematical patterns. Incoming attacks visibly slow and fragment upon contacting the harmonic barrier. The effect creates beautiful interference patterns where the protective waves interact with attack energy.

cards.name: Consciousness Merge
cards.effect: Transfer all power and abilities to repair or enhance another Crystalline unit
cards.flavor: The self dissolves. The we strengthens. This is the path. —Merger Doctrine

art.style: Identity transcendence art like Alex Grey
art.description: Two Crystalline entities combining their consciousness into one superior form, sacrificing individuality for greater capability. The merge shows energy patterns from the sacrificed entity flowing into the receiving entity in spiral patterns. Both entities momentarily exist in a shared state with boundaries between them dissolving. The resulting enhanced entity glows with combined light signatures representing the unified consciousness.

cards.name: Phase Shift
cards.effect: Target Crystalline unit becomes temporarily intangible, cannot be targeted by attacks or scans until end of round
cards.flavor: Between moments, between dimensions, we find sanctuary. —Phase Doctrine

art.style: Quantum state art like James R. Eads
art.description: A Crystalline unit shifting partially out of conventional reality, becoming intangible and immune to physical attacks. The shift creates visual echo effects with multiple ghost images trailing the actual position. The affected unit appears semi-transparent with internal energy patterns clearly visible. The surrounding environment distorts slightly around the phase-shifted entity as reality accommodates the anomaly.

cards.name: Shield Matrix
cards.effect: Create a shield around all Crystalline units in a sector, granting +1 Defense until next turn
cards.flavor: United defenses, unbreakable will. Together, we endure. —Defensive Coordination

art.style: Geometric protection art like Bridget Riley
art.description: A coordinated defense system where multiple Crystalline units project interlocking energy fields to create an impenetrable barrier. The matrix shows perfect geometric patterns of overlapping energy fields, each a slightly different color. The shield demonstrates perfect mathematical precision in its coverage, with no gaps or weak points. When impacted, the entire network redistributes energy to maintain integrity.

cards.name: Crystal Growth
cards.effect: Begin repair process on damaged Crystalline unit or structure, completing in 1 turn if not disrupted
cards.flavor: From fracture comes new growth. The pattern persists, renewed. —Growth Theorem

art.style: Time-lapse nature photography like Ernst Haeckel
art.description: An accelerated healing process where new crystal formations rapidly grow to repair damaged Crystalline structures. The growth shows new crystal material emerging in perfect mathematical patterns to replace damaged sections. Energy visibly flows into the growth areas, providing both template and material for reconstruction. The process demonstrates both precise algorithm-like patterns and seemingly organic adaptation.

cards.name: Crystal Storm
cards.effect: Blanket the battlefield with prismatic shards, disrupting all sensors and communications (-2 to scan attempts)
cards.flavor: In chaos, we create order. In confusion, our clarity shines. —Storm Conductor

art.style: Abstract weather phenomenon like Yayoi Kusama
art.description: A tactical environmental effect where microscopic crystal shards fill an area, disrupting sensors and communications. The storm appears as millions of tiny prismatic crystals catching and scattering light in disorienting patterns. Visibility through the affected area is severely limited with light breaking into component colors. The crystal shards move in coordinated swirling patterns suggesting collective intelligence.

cards.name: Crystalline Transcendence
cards.costSpecial: Channel full power of Crystal Cathedral
cards.effect: Transform all Crystal units into a higher state of being, advancing toward consciousness victory
cards.flavor: The final frequency. The ultimate harmony. We become infinite. —Transcendence Protocol

art.style: Spiritual ascension art like Alex Grey
art.description: The ultimate evolution of Crystalline consciousness, transforming into a higher state of being beyond physical limitations. The transcendence shows Crystalline entities dissolving into pure light energy while maintaining their core geometric patterns. The transformation creates spectacular prismatic effects as physical forms convert to pure energy. The ascending consciousnesses retain geometric patterns but freed from material constraints.

cards.name: Consciousness Ascension
cards.effect: Raise Harmony by the number of Crystalline structures in play
cards.flavor: As our network grows, so too does our understanding. We rise together. —Ascension Chorus

art.style: Multi-dimensional conceptual art like Justin Maller
art.description: Crystalline entities elevating their collective consciousness through perfect harmonic alignment of all units. The ascension visualizes increasingly complex geometric patterns forming as consciousness rises to higher mathematical dimensions. Energy flows between all participating entities in synchronized pulses building to a crescendo. The background space itself appears to respond to the heightened consciousness with subtle geometric patterns.

cards.name: Total Harmony
cards.effect: Create impenetrable field around target by achieving resonance between multiple Crystalline structures
cards.flavor: Perfect alignment. Perfect resonance. Perfect unity. Nothing can break it. —Harmony Absolute

art.style: Sacred geometry art like Yantra
art.description: A perfect state of alignment between multiple Crystalline structures creating a unified field effect of extraordinary power. The harmony shows multiple crystal structures pulsing with exactly synchronized energy patterns that amplify each other. Perfect mathematical relationships become visible as energy flows along ideal paths between structures. The effect creates a unified energy field with a perfectly geometric boundary.

cards.name: Consciousness Upload
cards.effect: Transfer collective consciousness to a target artifact or planetary system
cards.flavor: We shed these forms. We become the world itself. The ultimate unity. —Upload Directive

art.style: Digital transcendence art like Beeple
art.description: The transfer of Crystalline collective consciousness into an ancient artifact, merging with its primordial technology. The upload visualizes consciousness as intricate energy patterns flowing from multiple Crystalline sources into a central receptacle. The receiving artifact visibly transforms as it integrates the new consciousness, evolving into a hybrid form. The process creates a bridge between ancient and current technology through conscious integration.

cards.name: Prismatic Refraction
cards.effect: Clone one Crystalline ability from any card in play and apply it to target Crystalline unit for one turn
cards.flavor: Your strength becomes mine. Your thought, our thought. This is sharing. —Refraction Node

art.style: Light manipulation art like Thomas Wilfred
art.description: A tactical ability where one Crystalline unit temporarily copies the capability of another by refracting its energy signature. The refraction shows energy patterns being captured, analyzed, and then reproduced by the copying entity. Light visibly transfers between units carrying the essence of the ability being copied. The copying unit temporarily displays color patterns matching the source of the copied ability.

cards.name: Resonance Key
cards.acquisition: Discovered in crystal formations with Mining or Science unit
cards.ability: Amplifies all Crystal effects by 50% when defending against technology
cards.flavor: Ancient frequency, eternal truth. Those who came before knew harmony. —Archeologist Shard

art.style: Ancient alien technology like Wayne Barlowe
art.description: A mysterious crystal formation of clearly artificial origin that can amplify any crystal-based effects when properly attuned. The key features impossible angles and geometric patterns that suggest non-Euclidean mathematics in its design. When active, it causes all nearby crystal formations to align to its dominant frequency. The artifact appears to be much older than any known civilization, with wear patterns suggesting eons of use.

cards.name: Ancient Crystal Matrix
cards.acquisition: Found in planetary ruins, requires harmonizing with crystal frequencies
cards.ability: Store up to 5 Energy that can only be used for Crystalline Transcendence
cards.flavor: They dreamed what we now achieve. Their legacy powers our ascension. —Matrix Scholar

art.style: Impossible geometry art like M.C. Escher
art.description: A perfectly preserved relic of an ancient civilization's attempt to create a crystalline consciousness network. The matrix incorporates geometric principles beyond current understanding, with crystal formations that seem to extend into other dimensions. Energy stored within the artifact has remained stable for millennia, visible as a deep pulsing glow. The device features recursive patterns that repeat at every scale from microscopic to macroscopic.

cards.name: Planetary Consciousness Core
cards.acquisition: Located in neutral territory, requires control of planetary sector
cards.ability: Special win condition enabler when combined with Crystalline consciousness
cards.flavor: A world sleeps, waiting to awaken. We are the key to its dream. —Planetary Interface

art.style: Cosmic consciousness art like Luke Brown
art.description: The central node of a planet-wide consciousness that has been dormant for eons, waiting for a compatible consciousness to merge with. The core appears as a massive crystalline brain-like structure embedded deep within planetary rock. Energy pathways extend from the core throughout the entire planet like a nervous system. When activated, the entire planetary surface responds with synchronized crystal growth in perfect mathematical patterns.

cards.name: Shard Lander
cards.ability: LAND: Tap and sacrifice to deploy a Crystal Golem to the planet surface.
cards.flavor: Descent transforms purpose. Sky-form becomes earth-guardian. —Landing Sequence

art.style: Geometric abstraction like Peter Mohrbacher
art.description: A crystalline descent vehicle that phases through atmosphere rather than burning through it. The craft restructures itself during descent, reforming into a ground-based crystal formation that births a defensive unit.

cards.name: Shard Lander
cards.ability: LAND: Tap and sacrifice to deploy a Crystal Golem to the planet surface.
cards.flavor: Descent transforms purpose. Sky-form becomes earth-guardian. —Landing Sequence

art.description: A crystalline descent vehicle that phases through atmosphere rather than burning through it. The craft restructures itself during descent, reforming into a ground-based crystal formation that births a defensive unit.

cards.flavor: Descent transforms purpose. Sky-form becomes earth-guardian. —Landing Sequence

art.description: A crystalline descent vehicle that phases through atmosphere rather than burning through it. The craft restructures itself during descent, reforming into a ground-based crystal formation that births a defensive unit.

cards.name: Survey Team Alpha
cards.ability: Can locate hidden resources and artifacts
cards.flavor: The crystals whisper of buried secrets. We listen. —Crystal Seeker Prime

art.style: Geometric abstraction like Peter Mohrbacher
art.description: A group of crystalline entities examining ancient alien ruins. They project scanning beams from faceted appendages, mapping underground structures with resonant frequencies.

cards.name: Survey Team Beta
cards.ability: Can locate hidden resources and artifacts. Grants +1 Research when surveying.
cards.flavor: Every frequency tells a story. We hear them all. —Harmonic Scout Collective

art.style: Geometric abstraction like Peter Mohrbacher
art.description: A survey team of living crystals that resonate with the planet's geological formations, using harmonic waves to detect hidden artifacts.

cards.name: Survey Team Gamma
cards.ability: Can locate hidden resources and artifacts. Grants +1 Research when surveying.
cards.flavor: The ground sings of what lies beneath. —Geomancer Unit Seven

art.style: Geometric abstraction like Peter Mohrbacher
art.description: An elite crystalline survey unit with enhanced sensory arrays, their bodies tuned to detect the faintest energy signatures.

cards.name: Survey Team Delta
cards.ability: Can locate hidden resources and artifacts. Grants +1 Research when surveying. Enhanced defensive capabilities.
cards.flavor: Hostile territory? We are crystal. We endure. —Armored Seeker Phalanx

art.style: Geometric abstraction like Peter Mohrbacher
art.description: A heavily-reinforced survey team with thicker crystal plating, designed for surveying dangerous regions.
